questions.questionText: Which of the following is the correct syntax for writing AngularJS expressions?
Which of the following is used to share data between controller and view in AngularJS?
The . . . . . decorator allows us to define the pipe name that is globally available for use in any template in the across application
If you chain multiple pipes together, they are executed

options.label: C
options.text: in the order in which you specify them

questions.questionText: Which of the following is true about the currency filter?

options.label: A
options.text: A currency filter is used to format the text in a currency format

options.label: B
options.text: A currency filter is a function that takes text as input.

questions.questionText: Which of the following is not built-in pipe in Angular?
Which of the following is an advantage of AngularJS?

options.label: C
options.text: AngularJS uses dependency injection and makes use of separation of concerns.

questions.questionText: Which of the following is not a valid AngularJS filter?
Which of the following statement is true about $dirty flag?

options.label: A
options.text: $dirty flag is used to state that the form has invalid data.

options.label: B
options.text: $dirty flag is used to state that value has been changed.
